Other SMART Containers

Besides the SMART reference implementation, there is a growing list of SMART containers. The following is a list of containers that are publicly available or open source.

  • i2b2 SMART
  • Indivo
  • Think!Med Clinical
  • OpenMRS SMART Container Module
  • Mirth Results SMART Container
  • WorldVista
  • Boston Childrens Hospital (Cerner)
